content: Wow. I can’t believe I’ve ever complained about my life or childhood after reading this. You had it tough, that is for damn sure. I’m gay, but masculine enough that most don’t pick up on it, though some slightly suspected it. I was effeminate growing up and came more into manhood when I left for college. I’m impossibly impressed that you survived such an incredibly hard go of it. You’re a new hero of mine.
